# Introduction
Hello, my name is Tina and this is my personal website. I am a second-year MPH student at Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health. I am in the Epidemiology department, with a certificate in Biostatistic. I also work at CUMC as a clinical research coordinator. 

# Music
I play a traditional Chinese instrument called Qin, which has a history of more than 3000 years.

# Hobby
I like music, traditional Asian cultures, and astronomy.
